question:
You are a math expert. When you respond, respond only with the Solution of the final Problem, thinking step by step. At the end of the Solution, when you give your final answer, write it in the form 'Final Answer: \\boxed{$answer$}. I hope it is correct.'
Find the minimum value of
\[17 \log_{30} x - 3 \log_x 5 + 20 \log_x 15 - 3 \log_x 6 + 20 \log_x 2\]for $x > 1.$
inference:
We can write
\begin{align*}
17 \log_{30} x - 3 \log_x 5 + 20 \log_x 15 - 3 \log_x 6 + 20 \log_x 2 &= 17 \cdot \frac{\log x}{\log 30} - 3 \cdot \frac{\log 5}{\log x} + 20 \cdot \frac{\log 15}{\log x} - 3 \cdot \frac{\log 6}{\log x} + 20 \cdot \frac{\log 2}{\log x} \\
&= \frac{17 \log x}{\log 30} + \frac{-3 \log 5 + 20 \log 15 - 3 \log 6 + 20 \log 2}{\log x} \\
&= \frac{17 \log x}{\log 30} + \frac{\log (15^{20} \cdot 2^{20} / 5^3 \cdot 6^3)}{\log x}.
\end{align*}Since $15^{20} \cdot 2^{20} / 5^3 \cdot 6^3 = 30^{17},$
\[\frac{17 \log x}{\log 30} + \frac{\log (15^{20} \cdot 2^{20} / 5^3 \cdot 6^3)}{\log x} = \frac{17 \log x}{\log 30} + \frac{17 \log 30}{\log x}.\]By AM-GM,
\[\frac{17 \log x}{\log 30} + \frac{17 \log 30}{\log x} \ge 2 \sqrt{\frac{17 \log x}{\log 30} \cdot \frac{17 \log 30}{\log x}} = 34,\]with equality when $\frac{17 \log x}{\log 30} = \frac{17 \log 30}{\log x},$ or $\log^2 x = (\log 30)^2.$  Since $x > 1,$ $\log x = \log 30,$ so $x = 30.$

Final Answer: $\boxed{34}$. I hope it is correct.
ground_truth:
We can write
\begin{align*}
&17 \log_{30} x - 3 \log_x 5 + 20 \log_x 15 - 3 \log_x 6 + 20 \log_x 2 \\
&= 17 \log_{30} x - \log_x 5^3 + \log_x 15^{20} - \log_x 6^3 + \log_x 2^{20} \\
&= 17 \log_{30} x + \log_x \frac{15^{20} \cdot 2^{20}}{5^3 \cdot 6^3} \\
&= 17 \log_{30} x + \log_x (2^{17} \cdot 3^{17} \cdot 5^{17}) \\
&= 17 \log_{30} x + 17 \log_x 30 \\
&= 17 \left( \log_{30} x + \frac{1}{\log_{30} x} \right).
\end{align*}By AM-GM,
\[\log_{30} x + \frac{1}{\log_{30} x} \ge 2,\]so $17 \left( \log_{30} x + \frac{1}{\log_{30} x} \right) \ge 34.$  Equality occurs when $x = 30,$ so the minimum value is $\boxed{34}.$
